Package network

Class NetworkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.NetworkController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogicNetwork
    public class NetworkController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogicNetwork
    This class is the connection between the logic interface and the network. It implements the interface methods as well as some other methods to reach out to the client, which communicates with its ClientConnection on the server.
    Author:
    fkleinoe
